item.title: The best Dow performer of the year isn’t a tech stock. Why analysts don’t expect a repeat performance
item.description: Caterpillar's year-to-date rally of 61% made it the Dow's biggest gainer this year, but analysts are expecting its momentum to slow down going forward...

item.title: There's a buying opportunity in Berkshire Hathaway as Warren Buffett steps away, investor says
item.description: Frank Holland breaks down what traders are watching ahead of the new session.

item.title: Wall Street wrote off Palantir as too expensive. Retail investors can't get enough
item.description: The stock, which made its market debut in 2020, is an indisputable star of the retail investing world.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are confident about these 3 dividend-paying stocks
